actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to enter into contracts or other agreements with appropriate law enforcement entities for the purpose of providing law enforcement services at Lake Tschida, North Dakota.
subjects: Federal aid to law enforcement agencies
subjects_top_term: Federal aid to law enforcement agencies

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior, through the Bureau of Reclamation, to enter into agreements with appropriate law enforcement entities for the purpose of providing law enforcement services to Lake Tschida, North Dakota.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to enter into contracts or other agreements with appropriate law enforcement entities for the purpose of providing law enforcement services at Lake Tschida, North Dakota.
